feed.title: GitHub R Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of R in GitHub

entry.title: mason-org/r-languageserver
entry.summary:
Wrapper around REditorSupport/languageserver that enables running the R language server as a standalone executable.

r-languageserver

Wrapper around REditorSupport/languageserver that:

  1. installs the language server to an isolated library location, and
  2. enables running the R language server as a standalone executable.

Usage

Installing

$ R --slave -f src/install.r <lib_loc> <ref>

Running

$ r-languageserver

entry.title: marinebon/aquamapsduckdb
entry.summary:
Reformatting of aquamapsdata R package with faster duck database and new terra package for rasters

aquamapsduckdb

Reformatting of aquamapsdata R package with faster duck database and new terra package for rasters

Installation

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("marinebon/aquamapsduckdb")
